name: Toy Car Interaction Prototype
description:
Less of a game and more of a tech art prototype for handling direct user interaction with a model in Unity.

A more detailed technical write-up can be viewed here:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1q1squifHzP2X8EXRz2YzmteLlMniZamv/view?usp=shari...

The following assets were used in this project:

  • Retro Cartoon Cars - Cicada asset from RCC Design:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/retro-cartoon-cars-cicada...

  • Engine2_idle_loop.wav by ReadeOnly

https://freesound.org/people/ReadeOnly/sounds/186939/

  • Shutting Car Door.wav by cameronmusic

https://freesound.org/people/cameronmusic/sounds/138399/

  • Car Door by Juandamb

https://freesound.org/people/Juandamb/sounds/430596/

  • Lamp Switch by pbharri

https://freesound.org/people/pbharri/sounds/426378/

  • Door_Stop.wav by Keston

https://freesound.org/people/keston/sounds/60497/

  • Bicycle Horn by AntumDeluge

https://freesound.org/people/AntumDeluge/sounds/188039/
